website_summaries.verdict: A low-cost, lightweight, aluminum hand tool with a sharp fork for weed removal.
pros: Rubber handle is comfortable and easy to grip
Users say they are able to get under roots for weed removal

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: Broke on first day of weeding. I'd consider myself a less than aggressive weed eradicator. I'm typically gentle on my tools though I do not hold back when a job needs to be done. This product broke weeding my lawn. You win this time weeds.
customer_reviews.author: Tarnishd

customer_reviews.title: Great for those Tap root weeds
customer_reviews.text: Dandelion weeds are a pain in the behind to get rid of. The reason is those long deep tap roots, you pull the top off but those roots ensure it keeps coming back. This is designed to allow those roots to be loosened and pulled out. The V tine cuts through compacted dirt and allows access to the root. This weeder is nice in that it has a cantilever point in the middle making it easier to rock the root out. The handle has a solid but comfortable grip. It also has a hole in the end of the handle to add a strap or use to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Santina Icestorm

customer_reviews.title: Spring gardening
customer_reviews.text: This tool is wonderful. It is easy to use and the grip/handle is very comfortable. The angle of the head allows you to really get down in the ground without too much difficulty, and it pulls up the weed well. I've already started cleaning out my raised beds for Spring and it this is really helpful!
customer_reviews.author: STX

customer_reviews.title: Very solid tool.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying this tool as items are rarely built like this bad boy! It exceeded all of my expectations thus far. It is very solid and will provide years of use. Unless you get one that has some sort of flaw in the material during the casting process, you will have something that will be around for a long time. I actually enjoy weeding with this tool knowing that it is friendly for the environment. Far too many people over-use products like weed & feed which actually can be counterproductive. No contaminating the groundwater with this! Go natural and spend some time with your lawn & garden!
customer_reviews.author: iheartmykids

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not for compact soil.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't really a fan of this too. I replaced one of the cheaper wooden-handled ones from the gardening store because it was creating blisters on my hand. This handle is definitely comfortable, but because the forks are much less sharp, and there is the additional piece of metal to help pry weeds out of the ground, I cant' get in as accurately around the base of the weed. It would likely be fine in looser soil in a garden, but I'm using it to remove weeds in a lawn with pretty compact soil. Because the soil is compact i can't get this weeder in nearly as deeply as the cheaper versions.
customer_reviews.author: Bouteloua

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of lawn weeds the manual way
customer_reviews.text: One of the tines was chipped off at the tip. The "elbow" bend section probably needs to be more pronounced. Other than that it's pretty nice, if you want to get rid of lawn weeds this takes a bit of work and perseverance but it REALLY works. We have NO weeds in our lawn now except poa grass but most of that dies by midsummer anyway. (Lawn is about 40% poa in springtime and pretty impossible to weed it all out.) Dandelions, goat heads, etc all gone. Lawn is St Augustine and you can't really spray it with weedkiller without half killing the lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Count Orloff

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Last year I was at an event and seen a similar weeding tool and had never seen anything like it. I hadn't found one until this Vremi Garden Weeder hand tool. The design is simple with a targeted head to remove weeds one at a time. This saves you time fighting with the weeds and pulling them by hand. The tool has helped pull the toughest weeds and leave my plants completely in tact. The handle is soft and easy to grip and it is perfect for the gardening projects we have coming up this year.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Fixel

customer_reviews.title: Think twice
customer_reviews.text: disappointed. the placement of the "blades" is not as helpful as my past tool...not sharp, wish I had kept my old one and had it sharpened!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tool.
customer_reviews.text: This tool is the best! Very sturdy, well made and gets those weeds out of my garden. I'm so pleased with it cause it works. And I bought it for a reasonable price. Yes, I'm so happy that I now have a tool that works. It gets those weeds that are like ground cover out. They spread close to the ground and are hard to get out. But now I can. Weeding can be fun when you have the proper tools.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: I seriously love every product this company makes
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love every product this company makes !! Vremi is awesome. The packing is always nice and the items are always quality. This little tool is small but powerful, it definitely gets the job done that you need it too. I love to go out to my flower beds and take out those dreaded weeds it is just a pain to do with your hands. The way that this tool is designed it makes pulling out weeds so much easier than it is with your hands. It just makes the whole process so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Super cute packaging with fun sayings if you are a ...
customer_reviews.text: This works on small dandelions, but not fully grown ones. Previous reviewers are right that you have to dig, but it doesn't go deep enough to extract deep roots, and breaks them off. Correct me if I'm wrong, but I thought one needed to get the entire root to get rid of dandelions. Super cute packaging with fun sayings if you are a pot head.....but really? my kid was questioning me!!!! If your soil is compacted, it is extremely difficult to use
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money - dirt clogs
customer_reviews.text: all it does is clog with dirt... great idea... needs work tho
customer_reviews.author: M.B. 29

customer_reviews.title: This little tool is great for weeds
customer_reviews.text: This little tool is great for weeds! We had old garden boxes full of weeds and this tool helped so much. The handle is nice and soft and the tool itself is very sturdy. It's a must have when weeds are a nuisance! Simple put the tool on the weed and pull up, the weed comes right up. Super easy! My kids love using it and it definitely makes gardening easier.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Colley

customer_reviews.title: Works good on narrow stems only
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy having a tool to help with weeding...especially those prickery ones! I feel the prongs should be a bit wider though. Maybe it's just that I have no clue what I am doing, or that my weeds are too thick because I had a hard time getting the prongs around the base to pull them out. Half the time I was successful in getting them by the root, the other half of the time they ripped out with the root still in the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hand weeder that will probably last a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made robust tool for digging up weeds. The bend in it works as the perfect fulcrum and will get out most if not all the roots of most weeds along with minimal damage to the lawn. The handle is very comfortable. Do not waste your money on cheaper weeders. This doesn't cost much more and will probably last you a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin murakami

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and saves my fingers.
customer_reviews.text: When I get tired of using my fingers to pull weeds, I would use a long flat head screwdriver and now decided to be more modern. This tool is pretty sweet. The prong tips do a good job scooping up the root of the weed. It works okay in dry soil, but better and easier in wet soil after the sprinklers run.
customer_reviews.author: J Tee

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Last year my husband built me a garden. We cut out a large area in my back yard and started digging out the grass. Well it was not fun at all. It was really tough and apparently we didnt get all the grass very well because as the veggies were growing,so was the grass. I wish I had this Weeder last year but I have it this year!!. I love the handle is ergonomically made of rubber that will help prevent my wrist from getting tired. Score! This weeder is very sturdy! I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: A quality rugged light weight tool.
customer_reviews.text: The weight balance and heft of this tool feels just right. I was concerned about aluminum in a tool ment to pry with, but it is so ruggedly built I am not concerned about damaging it. It is also light enough to use for a long time without feeling the effects of carrying a heavy tool around.
customer_reviews.author: RF-Eng

customer_reviews.title: Best weeder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the stand up weed puller to see which one worked the best. This one by far, sure you have to get on the ground to use it. But it's the only one I've used that really grabs the root and tends to get the whole root out. Used it for about 9 hours so far, and no breakage or concerns with wear.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made. Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Unless the soil is very hard, this tool does an excellent job of pulling up deep rooted weeds - most times it will extract the entire tap root. Without gloves you may develop a rub spot or blister, in spit of the ergo handle, so wear a pair of gloves if you are going to extract more than a few weeds.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ruggs

customer_reviews.title: Stop pulling weeds...use weeder hand tool!
customer_reviews.text: I like this. Easy to remove weed with the roots attached! I usually pull weeds out and which never gets the long roots and then the weed starts growing again. This weeder I push into the ground deep and I get the entire weed and roots. Doesn't take much strength to push the weed hand tool.
customer_reviews.author: LA in N.C.

customer_reviews.title: It broke while pulling radishes in wet dirt.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that the tool broke on the second day that I was using it. It broke where the handle met the aluminum. I was impressed at first because the design made it easy to remove radishes fast. This was a job where I needed to remove thousands of radishes from around a native plant planting mitigation where the soil had been contaminated with weeds. I had pull them out from under jute cloth. They were small to the size of a turnip.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't love it
customer_reviews.text: For me, it's much too big to be able to pull my weeds effectively. I dont know where other people's weeds grow but mine grow in the cracks between our sidewalk and this can barely get in there. It helps with its a weed in my garden or lawn but the reason I bought it was the little ones my fingers can't get to. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ewald

customer_reviews.title: Best one out there!
customer_reviews.text: Really solid weeder, the handle and metal is thick and sturdy. Never thought this would break... that was until I let my sister borrow it and after 30 minutes of use the metal part snapped from the handle! So make sure you are using controlled motions and not trying to dig out the weeds as fast as you can. Luckily for me she was nice enough to replace it and buy one for herself.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesnjeans

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't so easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This item is really well made. Very sturdy and comfortable to grip but when I attempted to use it, it just seemed awkward. Almost seemed to long? Perhaps I didn't do something right or just didn't use long enough to adjust to it.
customer_reviews.author: bryn

customer_reviews.title: Like the ergonomic design
customer_reviews.text: Like the shape and handle. Second purchase. Had one like this before but handle broke while trying to pull/pry a weed between a rock and sidewalk. Exerted too much pressure on the weed and rock and the weeder snapped at the handle.
customer_reviews.author: CMA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a gardener
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't expect much from this tool because of the price, but it is actually great! The tool is sturdy with rust proof metal, it works well for popping out stuck weeds, and it is packaged nice enough for gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: GingerSnap

customer_reviews.title: Nifty Weeding Tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nifty weeding tool! The prongs allow you to grab the weed, and the curved design gives you leverage to easily yank the weed out, roots and all. It has a good weight and thickness to it, so I don't see it warping or bending. I own several Vremi kitchen gadgets and appliances, and they are excellent quality, so I'm sure this follows suit!
customer_reviews.author: Alyson RiceTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: This is the first time I've had a yard big ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've had a yard big enough to worry about regular weed pulling. I got this in hopes of it helping cut the time I spend pulling weeds and the number of thorns I pick from my hands afterwards. It has done all that and more. Even my mother in law comes and helps, with the addition of this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle and Richard Rupanovic

customer_reviews.title: Supreme quality
customer_reviews.text: This utilitarian garden tool came packaged like a diamond necklace! (Okay, no velvet lining to the box - I exaggerate a tiny bit!) But really, the packaging is impressive. Then the tool itself is VERY solid and sturdy. This is a garden tool that will be passed down in the family.
customer_reviews.author: moviolla

customer_reviews.title: Pops Dandelions Out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and another tool with a straight shaft (Giggity!). After about a hour and a half pullin' weeds, this one is my preferred. It is solid AF and the designed made pulling weeds out faster than the straight bodied design of the other one I purchased (Wilcox All Pro 13" Stainless - which survived me running it over with the lawn mower).
customer_reviews.author: JinSA

customer_reviews.title: Still reppin' for them gardeners all across the world
customer_reviews.text: Solid piece! I expect that this tool will last a long time. Only pulled a few weeds with it so far but the fact that they give props to Dre and Snoop is enough for me to love it
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a well built weeder - very comfortable to hold and digs well in hard dirt. Only complaint would be the business end is not very long and so larger weeds with long roots are a multi-step affair to dig out. Have pulled 600-700 dandylions so far and other than dirt here and there looks as new. I think it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: videotechie

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: Genius tool!! Hate weeding, double hate when they break off. This solved my problem when pulling weeds that grew through landscape rocks. Very sturdy and easy to use. I have small hands but still wish the handle was a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: dtmom414

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This weeding device is a great improvement over everything I’ve ever had before. The design uses a simple lever to lift up the entire root system of most unwanted plants. And it is sturdy enough to easily extract weeds in the gravel.
customer_reviews.author: Sheba

customer_reviews.title: Solid, won't bend or break.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I am not too bright but I thought it had to dig deeper to remove a dandelion root. This one can't go far down. Therefore most of the root stays in the soil. Is it going to grow still ?
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis M.

customer_reviews.title: Simple & Effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little guy to help me with the weeds in the front of my house. I would have personally preferred a little smaller but this does the job and is really sturdy and did a great job. Handle is great and design looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Start Up Guy

customer_reviews.title: Super Handy Tool
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how much easier this makes weeding. I can't believe I went all these years without one! Weeding is still a chore, but this tool really does make it faster and more efficient. The roots come out with the weeds much more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Best weeding assistant ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have a love hate relationship with hand weeding. Mainly this is because I have too big a yard, and some arthritis in my hands. I’ve owned more than several weed pokers (as I call them) over the years and this one is the best ever! And at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Didn't appear to work
customer_reviews.text: Have used one of these type of tools in the past, but even though it seemed sturdy was ineffective on the weeds in our yard. Might be too blunt and wide. Maybe the weeds are just tougher...
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this hand tool last week when the ground softened up a bit. It really gets in the dirt and grabs the weeds by the roots. It's pretty effortless. It fits well in my hand. And it doesn't slip when I exert force onto it. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: tfkent

customer_reviews.title: the best out there
customer_reviews.text: i'm 69, and have used a few such weed pullers in my life. this one is the best i've used, and is beautifully designed. easy on the hands as well.
customer_reviews.author: bob mills

customer_reviews.title: Nice weeder
customer_reviews.text: The soft handle and steep pry angle make this the best small hand weeder of the many I’ve used over the years. We’ll see how it holds up as this is the first one we’ve had made of aluminum. As with all hand weeders, the moisture content of the ground is important.
customer_reviews.author: Terry A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the BEST dandelion weeding tool ever made! The handle is very comfortable, and the thing is very strong and well made. Makes the job 100% easier than the cheaper models with the hard plastic handles and weak metal prongs. This is the gold star of garden weeders for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs ID

customer_reviews.title: Helps to get pesky weeds out!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of rhizome type weeds in my front garden and it's so hard to pull them by hand. This tool helps to pull the whole rhizome up and makes weeding go so much faster! Wish I had bought one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Breakable
customer_reviews.text: This is a less expensive tool which is a great price value but it is not solid metal construction. It is however die cast metal inside. I broke mine accidentally when trying to pluck weeds near bricks.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Solid Weeding Tool! Great Grip!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid weeding tool that helps you pull up weeds by the root. Works best on thick rooted weeds, which are the ones that would really need a tool like this. I was surprised at the weight - it's heavier and feels great in hand. It was packaged very nicely too - Think "apple" product packaging. This weeder would make a nice addition to a gardening gift basket. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: LexiLu

customer_reviews.title: Good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I finally pick my weeds out yesterday. It works as advertised. Only complaint is the “V” opening is a bit small. If the opening is bigger , it will make picking weeds easier
customer_reviews.author: Qstav

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves this Weeder
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife, as she regularly uses this weeder and swears by its effectiveness. Yes, you can find cheaper but when a product works well, the price isn't always the concern for some of us.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy has a much thicker body to it, and i haven't felt it flex a bit through months of heavy use. Much better product for the cost than those wiry alternatives!
customer_reviews.author: just bought this

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but felt it was necessary for this well designed item. I was a bit skeptical when I saw the price (under $5) compared to other weed pullers but now I can honestly say it works really good! I cant soeak to the durability but it seems pretty strong. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Reverend Rick

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice--but doesn't do the job
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a lost weed puller and got this. Unlike the old one, it fails to pull the weed out by the root. It's poorly designed and a waste of time and energy. I am hoping to send it back. I think the one I received was a return in that the plastic bag it came in was unsealed. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Savitz

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be too light weight and bend or break in use, but so far so good :) And I use this for pretty hardcore weeds and even some growing in the concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic garden tool!
customer_reviews.text: This Garden Weeder is very sturdy and excellent for small weeds in garden beds. You might have to work around the root bed of larger weeds like crabgrass, but it still gets to the root and gets the job done. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Great Weed Puller
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very sturdy and makes weed pulling a breeze. It is bent so that the tool allows a fulcrum to make weed pulling easy. Much better than the old one I had that had a straight tool.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I let my yard get out of control and now it is a summery sea of dandelions. This does a great job of popping them right out of the ground. I've used it for a few hours now and have cleared out a good size area pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: To use. Not sharp. I do not recommend this weed puller. Bought the old fashion kind and I'm much happier. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic weeder for the area around my landscaping bushes
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic weeder for the area around my landscaping bushes. I have a small yard, so not much gardening going on, but this weeder is the perfect size for me to clean out around the bushes lining the front of my house. They are sharp enough to dig down without having to use much pressure. I have also used them to separate the soil in my pots when re-planting my indoor plants. I am keeping this weeder in mind for future gifts for family members who have a green thumb.
customer_reviews.author: K.C. King

customer_reviews.title: Summer garden life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I have an issue with weeds every year in my garden. I have never used a weeded like this one before. I was pleasantly surprised when I got it and seen how thick and we'll made it is. The shape of the weeded makes it very easy to use. This is going to be a life saver this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Smw

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: After bending two of the seeders from the home improvement store I decided to step up to this one... my soil is pretty rocky and these are up to the challenge. Comfortable to use and excellent for loosening the soil to help you get the entire toot
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little tool. It is sturdy and does a great job of pulling weeds. I bought mine mostly for dandelions. It does a great job at that. As a nice bonus it came in a neatly packaged box. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cap10Hook

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked the design and it's easy to use. It worked great for the first 5 minutes of use. Unfortunately, that was all it got used for before the tips broke off pulling weeds out of the lawn. The cast aluminum is very brittle and poor quality. This tool might be okay if only used in soft soils, but you could just pull the weeds out by hand in that situation. I do not recommend this product and I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit bigger than I thought but it works great! Dry dirt, wet dirt, and even rocks. Had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Shannen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best weeders that I have owned. The handle is very comfortable and doesn't cause hand fatigue after extended use. The curved shape definitely helps with the larger, harder to get weeds. The forked tip was nice and sharp and cut through the weeds with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M.

customer_reviews.title: becoming my favorite tool
customer_reviews.text: I now keep this near the front door to grab for quick attacks on garden weeds. Strong, effective. Does not displace surrounding area as much as a trowel would. Length is a positive for removing dandelions. Well designed, comfy in hand, and sturdy: I pried up a few rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen C.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This tool sucks! This is only the 2nd time I used it and it broke off at the handle! Don’t bother getting it as it’s a waste of money! I would return it but it’s past the return date!
customer_reviews.author: mariannaray

customer_reviews.title: Great for tough weeds
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy & easy to use. Highly recommend---but you do need elbow grease added to this weeder!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Farris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: These showed up quickly and leave nothing to be desired. Astonishing quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Nangeroni

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my gardening set.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a strong and well built tool. I can't wait for the warmer weather to be able to use it more but I was able to go out and easily clean up my winter mess in my garden using just this tool. I got the roses that I wanted to get out all year without even needing to touch the stems. So happy to have this tool.
customer_reviews.author: discfocused

customer_reviews.title: I like the bowed head of the weeding tool because it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the bowed head of the weeding tool because it helps you get the leverage needed to pull the weed out by the roots. But the tool isn’t durable. The first time I used it, I was weeding between the slabs of my driveway and the prongs broke. I’m not sure what kind of metal they are made of, but it isn’t strong. As soon as the prong hit the concrete, it snapped. See photo.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon G.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and of good quality
customer_reviews.text: I dig out a lot of weeds using it, even rocks of size of baseball. For a very large area, this tool is too small. What good about this tool is that it helps to get the roots out.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works great, much bigger than I thought it would be. Note, it only works on fairly larger/thick-stalked weeds.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Pulling bigger weeds
customer_reviews.text: Took a little more effort to pull up bigger weeds like thistles, but otherwise worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: jeanshu

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable  good use for roots
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to use. Unquie shape dows help to pull up roots. light weight, easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's weird shape doesn't make any sense until you start using it. It's heavy duty and comfortable at the same time. Usually when I weed, I can expect hand cramps, but with this my hand never started cramping. In the time that I've used it, not once has it bent. The aluminum is thick enough that once in the ground it can get the tough weeds right out!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen P.

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and works well. It allows me to pull weeds easily even with wrist and elbow problems. This was packaged nicely, maybe a little too much. It was worth every penny. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mizz Picky

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy. I only wish it extended a bit more at the tip so I could get those dandelions better.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Arias

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hand tool for weeds.
customer_reviews.text: This is a easy to use tool for flower beds, garden, and the yard. I use it all the time and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Wadenius

customer_reviews.title: Nice, well made and works
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. Unfortunately I lost it. Will be ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Easy to dig weeds with deep root
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and feels sturdiness. The shape of the tip helps remove roots with less soil.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: It is SO awesome. VERY sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am in a state that's still cold right now, but I just ordered this tool. It is SO awesome. VERY sturdy. Ergonomically comfortable. Great quality product. I'm certain it will hold up to a lot of wear and tear, because it is a seriously solid piece of equipment. Going to make digging a LOT easier!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I do not like to garden, but this tool makes it a little easier. I like that! It seems sturdy enough and will make getting some of those nasty weeds out of my lawn!
customer_reviews.author: Marie-elena Baker

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just what this gardener was looking for. Gets those tough weeds out fast
customer_reviews.author: JUDIE N.

customer_reviews.title: Snapped in half after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE** company immediately sent me a new one after I emailed them. Excellent customer service, and now I have my favorite gardening tool again! Ordered this product in April 2019. Used it to dig up dandelions and other weeds. Worked great for a few months, today I was using it to dig up onions and the metal snapped off inside this plastic handle (see pics). I liked it as a useful gardening tool, but not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice tool to have in the garden when you are ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tool to have in the garden when you are not a user of chemicals. It works great on getting right down to the roots to avoid the weed growing back. The handle is nice and big has a comfortable grip on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark & Katie Thomes

customer_reviews.title: Simply doesn't work. The fork doesn't grab roots and ...
customer_reviews.text: Simply doesn't work. The fork doesn't grab roots and the bend in the tool designed to pry the roots is too sharp an ankle meaning you can't get deep enough.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this weeder! Easy to hold and use; well made; does the job!
customer_reviews.author: BADesigner

customer_reviews.title: Best weed removal tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect design for pull weeds. The ergonomics are perfect for removing the weeds and the entire root system. Buying a spare one just to keep on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Caccavo

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Hey, if my husband loves it....its great!! He has a green thumb and this was a gift and he uses it! Recommended. Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Gr8full

customer_reviews.title: It works Gggrrrrrreeeeraaatt!!!
customer_reviews.text: Update, this works great but definitely has its limits. I broke it in half within a month. I'm also dealing with an overgrown mess. Great marketing, excellent product. It's not just great, its tony the tiger great, and that's a lot.
customer_reviews.author: arrayoftrades

customer_reviews.title: Best garden tool EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you're a gardener, you need this tool in your life. Gets weeds at the root without pulling your plants along with them. It also allows you to get the really stubborn ones, with ease. Fits comfortably in any size hand. Feels very sturdy. I expect it will last many years. Great product! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Carrie G

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This product is just okay. Nothing extraordinary, does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Maria J

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: Broke on root so be careful. Other than that very nice. It was 3 months old and I called vremi and they immediately sent a replacement. Very nice of them.
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Keefner

customer_reviews.title: This tool saved my sanity in the fight against thistles
customer_reviews.text: This tool saved my sanity in the fight against thistles. Literally the only thing that has helped me beat them back out of my yard.
customer_reviews.author: brittany c zerkle

customer_reviews.title: Should last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and great quality! Every gardener needs this hand tool. Wished I had purchased years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Trish K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after comparing to the local Home Depot. This product was cheaper, and had great reviews. Works perfectly, does just what it claims it will.
customer_reviews.author: Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for pulling weeds and crab grass. Not just for use in the garden, but also good for use in the yard. For the money it was the best deal I could find. It is very sturdy and the design makes it very easy and effective. After using it, I confidently can say there is little chance it will ever break.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It works well for shallow weeds but not deep root weeds and too short.
customer_reviews.author: TriedIt

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. Very strong for pulling out dandelions!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Breaks roots off instead of pulling them out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would be able to grab onto roots and pull them up. We've had a lot of rain lately and my soil has been nice and soft. The tool has no trouble digging in, but still breaks the roots instead of pulling them out clean. It's probably ok if you need to get rid of some weeds ASAP but won't do the job of prevention.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

product_meta.title: Vremi Garden Weeder Hand Tool - Aluminum Fork Tip Gardening Weed Remover with Ergonomic Rubber Handle for Planting and Weeding - Handheld Dandelion Cultivator for Flower and Vegetable Plants Care
product_meta.description: Is your overgrown garden heavy on your mind? Fit in an afternoon pruning session with the Vremi O. G. Garden weeder - the handheld tool kit for rescuing your beautiful flowers or vegetables from pesky dandelion roots, thistles & other garden invaders. Unlike other welders, this small Weed Picker has a sharp forked tip & a curved head that give you the leverage you need to tackle even the most stubborn weeds. Its ergonomic comfort grip handle helps minimize arm & wrist fatigue while you work. The handle is designed with a ring so you can conveniently hook it on the wall so you won't longer need to search through drawers or scour your woodshed just when you need it The most. This heavy duty hand claw weeder is a perfect addition to your shovel, trowel, clippers, trimmer, Digger, seeder, pliers & other planting supplies & equipment to help you grow your beautiful indoor or outdoor garden. A great gifts idea to your mom, dad grandma or boys & Girls amateur or professional planter. product details & Care size: 12. 5 x 1. 5 in (31. 6 x 3. 8 cm) weight: 0. 4 lbs (181. 4 g) materials: rust proof aluminum head & TPR rubber handle handwashing recommended warning: sharp edges. Handle with care This is not a toy. Keep out of reach of children
feature_bullets: HANDY WEED REMOVER - Cute handheld weeder tool is perfect for removing thistles, dandelions, and other pesky weeds from garden or lawn without digging wide hoes to get the entire root. Lightweight yet sturdy to make gardening tasks smooth and simple

SHARP ALUMINUM FORK TIP - Mini weed puller is made of die-cast aluminum metal that won't bend or break and has a rust resistant finish for lasting value. Two pronged forked tip digs up grass from the roots for permanent removal and lasting protection

ERGONOMIC RUBBER HANDLE - Garden tool is designed with a rubber handle with indented curves and spongy thumb indentation for a comfortable grip that is great for children, adults, and seniors with arthritis to prevent hand fatigue while you work

SMART CURVED HEAD DESIGN - Small heavy duty garden weeder features a curve shaped head that gives you more leverage to make prying out stubborn weeds easier and faster. A perfect addition to your rake shears and other gardening tools and accessories

GREAT GARDENING GIFT IDEA - This indoor and outdoor garden tool is a perfect gift for men and women gardener or kids and children who always want to lend a helping hand in the garden. Hand wash only to clean dirt and hang it on wall for easy storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars516 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
